text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump TRUMP’s MISMANAGEMENT OF THE TRUMP FLU IS THE ABSOLUTE WORST IN THE ENTIRE WORLD – despite his Deputy Propagandist (Press Sec), his Assistant Deputy Propagandist (VP Pence), and his GOP apologists praising him for how good a job he is doing.  DOCTORS WRONG? #Coronavirus https://t.co/cZhXTbpFtb
